item.title: US-95 North Approaching I-80
item.description: US-95 north approaching I-80. Use I-80 East/US-95 North to Lovelock; use I-80 West/Alt. US-95 South to Reno. Turn left to enter the Rest Area. Notice the post mile marker at the base of the sign.

item.title: US-50 East/US-95 North - Fallon
item.description: US-50 East/US-95 North at US-95 north. Turn left for US-95 north to Winnemucca; continue straight for US-50 east to Ely.

item.title: US-95 North at US-50
item.description: US-95 north at US-50 in Fallon. Turn left for US-50 west to Carson City and Reno. Turn right for US-50 East (not signed) and US-95 north to Winnemucca. US-95 joins US-50 for a few blocks through Fallon.

item.description: US-95 North approaching US-50 in Fallon.

item.title: Nevada Postmile - FR-407
item.description: Nevada Post Mile Marker at the Jessup exit (Exit 78) on I-80. The postmile refers to FR-407 - which is the internal number for a Frontage Road.
